headline: EPAM and Cursor Announce Strategic Partnership to Build and Scale AI-Native Teams for Global Enterprises
summary: EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE: EPAM), a leading digital and AI transformation services company, today announced a strategic partnership with Cursor, a leading AI-powered development platform, to accelerate enterprise adoption of generative AI engineering for clients. By combining EPAM's proven expertise in large-scale technology implementation with Cursor's demonstrated success in AI-Native coding solutions, the partnership enables organizations to adopt AI-Native workflows that streamline engineerin

content.title: EPAM and Cursor Announce Strategic Partnership to Build and Scale AI-Native Teams for Global Enterprises
content.summary: EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE: EPAM), a leading digital and AI transformation services company, today announced a strategic partnership with Cursor, a leading AI-powered development platform, to accelerate enterprise adoption of generative AI engineering for clients. By combining EPAM's proven expertise in large-scale technology implementation with Cursor's demonstrated success in AI-Native coding solutions, the partnership enables organizations to adopt AI-Native workflows that streamline engineerin

thumbnail.caption: EPAM empowers clients to unlock the full potential of Cursor by supporting Scaled AI-Native Workflows, Access to Frontier Capabilities and Accelerated Adoption.
